= 安装 =
依赖libevent
{{{
wget http://www.memcached.org/files/memcached-1.4.17.tar.gz
tar xf memcached-1.4.17.tar.gz
cd memcached-1.4.17
./configure --with-libevent=/usr
make && make install
}}}
